title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup - March 14th
itunes:title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup - March 14th
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from our usual Kardashian family weekly update to A Reddit user post on if it's normal to split the cost of rent when your partner is making $500K a year. See below for the topics of the week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • Tristan Thompson told Maralee Nichols he was “Engaged” to Khloe and would soon be married Amid Paternity Suit
  • Kim Kardashian's advice to women in business is getting some major backlash
  • A Peek inside Khloe Kardashian's pantry
  • Kim and Pete are officially "IG official"


Other Updates

  • Alec Baldwin and his change in tune: Rust contract makes me untouchable
  • Reddit post segment - Should you pay equal rent if there’s a significant pay gap between partners?




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
